description.english: Depart the witch's manor and head for the sanctuaries.
description.schinese: 离开魔女的家前往神域
description.japanese: 魔女の家を出て神域へ向かう
description.french: Quitter le Manoir de la Sorcière et s'aventurer dans les domaines.
description.german: Das Hexenhaus verlassen und in die Heiligen Stätten reisen.
description.spanish: Sal de la mansión de la bruja y dirígete hacia los santuarios.
description.brazilian: Saia da Mansão da Bruxa em rumo ao Santuário.

description.english: Slay Heoxilia.
description.schinese: 对菲奥奇利亚进行讨伐
description.japanese: フィオジリアを討伐する
description.french: Vaincre Heoxilia.
description.spanish: Acaba con Heoxilia.
description.brazilian: Elimine Heoxilia.

description.english: Slay Neovonis.
description.schinese: 对伐尼奥维尼斯进行讨伐
description.japanese: ニオヴァニスを討伐する
description.french: Vaincre Neovonis.
description.spanish: Acaba con Neovonis.
description.brazilian: Elimine Neovonis.

description.english: Slay Lundrute.
description.schinese: 对兰托鲁多进行讨伐
description.japanese: ランドルートを討伐する
description.french: Vaincre Lundrute.
description.spanish: Acaba con Lundrute.
description.brazilian: Elimine Lundrute.

displayName.japanese: アンカーヴァイエ討伐

description.english: Slay Ankah-Vaye.
description.schinese: 对安加维耶进行讨伐
description.japanese: アンカーヴァイエを討伐する
description.french: Vaincre Ankah-Vaye.
description.spanish: Acaba con Ankah-Vaye.
description.brazilian: Elimine Ankah-Vaye.

displayName.japanese: エフーフ・パールーノ討伐

description.english: Slay Efufu-Paluno.
description.schinese: 对埃夫·帕拉诺进行讨伐
description.japanese: エフーフ・パールーノを討伐する
description.french: Vaincre Efufu-Paluno.
description.spanish: Acaba con Efufu-Paluno.
description.brazilian: Elimine Efufu-Paluno.

description.english: Slay Nozoth.
description.schinese: 对诺萨斯进行讨伐
description.japanese: ノーザースを討伐する
description.french: Vaincre Nozoth.
description.spanish: Acaba con Nozoth.
description.brazilian: Elimine Nozoth.

description.english: Listen to the Lost Epic.
description.schinese: 聆听LOST EPIC
description.japanese: LOST EPICに耳を傾ける
description.french: Se voir conter un récit épique, oublié à travers les âges.
description.spanish: Escucha la Epopeya olvidada.
description.brazilian: Ouça a história do LOST EPIC.

displayName.english: The Fall of the God of Everlasting Darkness
displayName.german: Untergang der Gottheit der Ewigen Dunkelheit
displayName.spanish: La caída del dios de la perpetua oscuridad
displayName.brazilian: Execução do Deus das Trevas Perpétuas

description.english: Slay the God of Everlasting Darkness.
description.schinese: 对常暗之神进行讨伐
description.japanese: 常闇の神を討伐する
description.french: Vaincre la Noirceur Absolue.
description.german: Die Gottheit der Ewigen Dunkelheit besiegen.
description.spanish: Acaba con el dios de la perpetua oscuridad.
description.brazilian: Elimine o Deus das Trevas Perpétuas.

displayName.english: The Fall of the Twin Gods
displayName.spanish: La caída de los dioses gemelos

description.english: Slay the Twin Gods.
description.schinese: 对双子之神进行讨伐
description.japanese: 双子の神を討伐する
description.french: Vaincre la Dualité.
description.spanish: Acaba con los dioses gemelos.
description.brazilian: Elimine os Deuses Gêmeos.

description.english: Reach your end without having fulfilled your knightly duties.
description.schinese: 未完成骑士使命，只能长眠于此
description.japanese: 騎士としての使命を全うできず生涯を終える
description.koreana: 기사로서의 사명을 완수하지 못하고 죽음을 맞이함
description.french: Périr sans avoir accompli son devoir de chevalier.
description.german: Das Ende erreichen, ohne die ritterlichen Pflichten zu erfüllen.
description.spanish: Termina tu vida sin cumplir con tus deberes caballerescos.
description.brazilian: Chegue ao fim sem ter cumprido seus deveres como Cavaleiro.

description.english: Reach your end having fulfilled all of your knightly duties given to you by the Witch of Nabel.
description.schinese: 完成内贝尔魔女嘱托的使命，以骑士身份长眠于此
description.japanese: 騎士としてネーベルの魔女に託された使命を全うし生涯を終える
description.koreana: 기사로서 네벨의 마녀에게 맡겨진 사명을 완수하고 죽음을 맞이함
description.french: Périr après avoir rempli son rôle auprès de la Sorcière de Nabel.
description.german: Das Ende erreichen und dabei alle Aufgaben der Hexe von Nebul erfüllen.
description.spanish: Termina tu vida habiendo cumplido con todos los deberes caballerescos que la Bruja de Nabel te ha encomendado.
description.brazilian: Chegue ao fim como Cavaleiro tendo realizado todas as missões da Bruxa de Nabel.

description.english: Begin your eternal life as a god, and watch over this world.
description.schinese: 成为守护世界的神，开始永不停息的生活
description.japanese: 世界を見守る神となって終わらぬ生涯を歩み始める
description.koreana: 세상을 지켜보는 신이 되어 영원한 생을 살기 시작함
description.french: Devenir la divinité qui veillera éternellement sur le monde.
description.german: Zum Gott werden und über die neue Welt wachen.
description.spanish: Empieza tu vida eterna como un dios y vigila este mundo.
description.brazilian: Torne-se um Deus imortal que continuará a proteger este mundo.

displayName.english: A Future Built with Human Hands
displayName.spanish: Un futuro hecho por manos humanas

description.english: Set foot into the world as a human.
description.schinese: 作为人类踏出这个世界
description.japanese: 人としてこの世界に踏み出す
description.french: Choisir de mener une existence de simple être humain.
description.spanish: Pon los pies en el mundo como humano.
description.brazilian: Torne-se um humano para ressurgir a este mundo.

description.english: Collect all of the mist.
description.schinese: 回收所有的雾气
description.japanese: ミストを全て回収する
description.french: Collecter toute la brume.
description.spanish: Junta toda la neblina.
description.brazilian: Colete todas as Brumas.

description.english: Take out all targets on the Kill List.
description.schinese: 完成杀戮名单的所有目标
description.japanese: キルリストを全て完了する
description.french: Éliminer tous les Sanctifiés de la liste de cibles.
description.german: Alle Ziele auf der Todesliste erlegen.
description.spanish: Elimina a todos los objetivos en la Lista de asesinatos.
description.brazilian: Elimine todos da Lista de Execução.

description.english: Collect a total of 10000000 anima.
description.french: Collecter un total de 10000000 d'anima.
description.spanish: Recolecta un total de 10000000  ánimas.
description.schinese: 魂值的累计获得数量达到10000000
description.japanese: アニマの累計獲得数10000000がになる
description.brazilian: Obtenha um total de 10000000 Anima.

description.english: Possess a heart worthy of a human.
description.schinese: 拥有一颗称得上【人】的心
description.japanese: 『人』足り得る心を持つ
description.french: Avoir l'âme d'un être humain.
description.spanish: Posee un corazón a la altura de un humano.
description.brazilian: Obtenha um coração digno de um “Humano”.

description.english: Catch all types of fish.
description.schinese: 钓到所有种类的鱼
description.japanese: 魚を全種類釣り上げる
description.french: Pêcher toutes les espèces de poissons.
description.spanish: Pesca todos los tipos de pescados.
description.brazilian: Pesque todas as espécies de peixes.

description.english: Cook all types of food.
description.schinese: 烹饪所有种类的料理
description.japanese: 料理を全種類作成する
description.french: Préparer toutes les recettes existantes.
description.spanish: Cocina todos los tipos de alimentos.
description.brazilian: Cozinhe todas as receitas.

description.english: Cultivate all types of plants.
description.schinese: 栽培所有种类的植物
description.japanese: 植物を全種類栽培する
description.french: Cultiver toutes les sortes de plantes.
description.spanish: Cultiva todos los tipos de plantas.
description.brazilian: Cultive todas as variedades de plantas.

description.english: Gather all types of materials.
description.schinese: 获得所有种类的素材
description.japanese: 素材を全種類獲得する
description.french: Collecter tous les types de matériaux.
description.spanish: Junta todos los tipos de materiales.
description.brazilian: Colete todos os Materiais.

description.english: Acquire all of the Divine Skills.
description.schinese: 习得所有的神技
description.japanese: 全てのシンギを習得する
description.french: Apprendre tous les Talents Divins.
description.spanish: Adquiere todas las habilidades divinas.
description.brazilian: Aprenda todas as Habilidades Divinas.

description.english: Perform 20 Divine Skill counters.
description.schinese: 成功使出20次神技反击
description.japanese: シンギカウンターを20回成功させる
description.french: Réussir 20 contres divins.
description.spanish: Ejecuta 20 contraataques a Habilidades divinas.
description.brazilian: Realize contra-ataques usando Habilidade Divina 20 vezes.

description.english: Gain complete mastery over a Divine Skill.
description.schinese: 任一神技达到最大熟练度
description.japanese: いずれかのシンギを最大熟練度まで上げる
description.french: Maîtriser un Talent Divin à son rang maximal.
description.spanish: Consigue la maestría completa de una Habilidad divina.
description.brazilian: Aumente até o máximo a proficiência de qualquer Habilidade Divina.

description.english: Obtain proof that you have reached the heights of the sanctuaries.
description.schinese: 获得达到神域高度的证明
description.japanese: 神域の高みに到達した証を得る
description.koreana: 신역의 높은 곳에 도달한 증거를 얻음
description.french: Atteindre le point culminant des domaines.
description.german: Beweis erhalten, dass du die Höhen der Heiligen Stätten erreicht hast.
description.spanish: Obtén la prueba de que has alcanzado las alturas de los santuarios.
description.brazilian: Consiga uma prova de que subiu ao topo dos Santuários.

description.english: Enhance any weapon to its maximum level.
description.schinese: 任一武器强化至最高等级
description.japanese: いずれかの武器を最大レベルまで強化する
description.french: Améliorer une arme jusqu'à son niveau maximal.
description.spanish: Mejora cualquier arma hasta su nivel máximo.
description.brazilian: Aperfeiçoe qualquer Arma até seu nível máximo.

description.english: Complete all of the requests on the bulletin board.
description.schinese: 完成揭示板上所有的委托
description.japanese: 掲示板の依頼を全て完了する
description.french: Accomplir toutes les demandes du panneau d'affichage.
description.german: Alle Aufträge auf dem Schwarzen Brett erledigen.
description.spanish: Completa todas las solicitudes en el tablón de anuncios.
description.brazilian: Complete toda as missões registradas no quadro de mensagens.

description.english: Make equipment from a god's anima for the first time.
description.schinese: 初次用神的魂值制作装备
description.japanese: 初めて神のアニマから武装を作成する
description.french: Fabriquer pour la première fois de l'équipement avec une anima divine.
description.german: Ausrüstung aus einer göttlichen Anima herstellen.
description.spanish: Fabrica equipo con el ánima de un dios por primera vez.
description.brazilian: Use um Anima Divino para criar uma Arma pela primeira vez.

description.english: Give Cecilia a god's anima for the first time.
description.schinese: 初次将神的魂值交给塞希莉娅
description.japanese: セシリアに初めて神のアニマを渡す
description.french: Donner pour la première fois de l'anima divine à Cecilia.
description.spanish: Dale a Cecilia el ánima de un dios por primera vez.
description.brazilian: Entregue um Anima Divino a Cecília pela primeira vez.

description.english: Make a weapon and evolve it to its final stage for the first time.
description.schinese: 初次制作进化终极阶段的武器
description.japanese: 初めて進化最終段階の武器を作成する
description.koreana: 처음 진화 최종 단계 무기를 제작
description.french: Faire évoluer pour la première fois une arme jusqu'à sa dernière forme possible.
description.german: Eine Waffe herstellen und maximal verwandeln.
description.spanish: Fabrica un arma y evoluciónala hasta su etapa final por primera vez.
description.brazilian: Evolua uma Arma até sua última forma pela primeira vez.

description.english: Complete each maze at least once.
description.schinese: 至少一次通过所有迷宫
description.japanese: 全てのメイズを1回以上クリアする
description.french: Terminer au moins une fois chaque dédale.
description.spanish: Completa cada laberinto al menos una vez.
description.brazilian: Complete todos os Labirintos ao menos uma vez.

description.english: Complete all of the quests from the Beautiful and Noble Dame.
description.schinese: 完成所有绝美高雅之女骑士的任务
description.japanese: 美しく気高い女騎士のクエストを全てクリアする
description.koreana: 아름답고 고상한 여기사의 퀘스트를 모두 클리어
description.french: Terminer toutes les quêtes de la belle et noble dame.
description.german: Alle Aufträge der schönen Frau abschließen.
description.spanish: Completa todas las misiones de la bella y noble dama.
description.brazilian: Complete todas as missões da Bela e Nobre Cavaleira.

description.english: Complete all of the quests from the Mongrel Boy.
description.schinese: 完成所有混血男子的任务
description.japanese: 混血の男の子のクエストを全てクリアする
description.french: Terminer toutes les quêtes du garçon hybride.
description.spanish: Completa toda las misiones del chico mestizo.
description.brazilian: Complete todas as missões do Garoto Mestiço.

description.english: Complete all of the quests from the Girl Hiding in the Sanctuaries.
description.schinese: 完成所有潜藏于神域的少女任务
description.japanese: 神域に潜む少女のクエストを全てクリアする
description.koreana: 신역에 숨어든 소녀의 퀘스트를 모두 클리어
description.french: Terminer toutes les quêtes de la jeune fille qui rôde dans les domaines.
description.german: Alle Aufträge des versteckten Mädchens abschließen.
description.spanish: Completa todas las misiones de la niña escondida en los santuarios.
description.brazilian: Complete todas as missões da Garota Escondida no Santuário.

displayName.brazilian: O Desfecho da Ambição sem Fim

description.english: Complete all of the quests from the Son of a God.
description.schinese: 完成所有神之子的任务
description.japanese: 神の息子のクエストを全てクリアする
description.french: Terminer toutes les quêtes du Fils Divin.
description.spanish: Completa toda las misiones del hijo de un dios.
description.brazilian: Complete todas as missões do Filho de Deus.

description.english: Complete all of the quests from the Lingering Soul.
description.schinese: 完成所有幽灵少女的任务
description.japanese: 幽霊少女のクエストを全てクリアする
description.french: Terminer toutes les quêtes de la jeune fille fantomatique.
description.german: Alle Aufträge der zurückgebliebenen Seele abschließen.
description.spanish: Completa toda las misiones del alma errante.
description.brazilian: Complete todas as missões da Garota Fantasma.

description.english: Learn a Secret Technique for the first time.
description.schinese: 初次掌握奥义
description.japanese: 初めて奥義を会得する
description.french: Apprendre un Arcane Secret pour la première fois.
description.spanish: Aprende una técnica secreta por primera vez.
description.brazilian: Aprenda uma Habilidade Oculta pela primeira vez.

displayName.spanish: El corazón hecho trizas de la bruja

description.english: Defeat the enraged Witch of Nabel.
description.schinese: 对发狂的内贝尔魔女进行讨伐
description.japanese: 発狂したネーベルの魔女を討伐する
description.french: Vaincre la sorcière de Nabel enragée.
description.german: Die wütende Hexe von Nebul besiegen.
description.spanish: Derrota a la demente Bruja de Nabel.
description.brazilian: Derrote a Bruxa de Nabel enlouquecida.

description.english: Visit every area on the map.
description.schinese: 踏遍地图上的每一处
description.japanese: マップを完全に踏破する
description.french: Parcourir la totalité de la carte.
description.german: Jedes Gebiet auf der Karte besuchen.
description.spanish: Visita cada zona en el mapa.
description.brazilian: Percorra por todas as áreas do Mapa.
